transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Namaste madam.
Customer: Namaste.
Executive: Haan ji.

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello. Haan ji ha madam ha ha.
Executive: Kya phone kya baat hai ji?
Customer: Aap Rapid Pharma se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji madam. Haan ji haan.
Customer: Sir aapka na ek concern aaya tha hamare paas mein.
Customer: To abhi last time humne aap se video meeting vagaira kiya tha. To usme matlab sara kuch clear ho gaya tha ya kuch abhi jaise aapko dobara se video meeting pe agar connect karna ho to hum available hai hum kar sakte hain aapka staff available hai?
Executive: Madam wo to baad ki baat hai ji. Pata kya hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir hamara kehne ka maksad ye hai IndiaMART hai ji all India pe kaam kar raha hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Uske paas lead khatam ho gayi ji kya kare hume matlab ki pata kya hai aap hume matlab ki
Customer: Main matlab ki aap lead kya kahu matlab ki aap na gumrah kar rahi hain.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says IndiaMART is misleading them.

- Customer says IndiaMART has run out of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked if the customer needs a video meeting.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Negative | Annoyed -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, misleading
